data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Governments should take the responsibility of taking care of homeless people. The top four causes of homelessness are (1) lack of affordable housing, (2) unemployment, (3) poverty, (4) mental illness. Governments should work with social workers to provide special support for them.（42 字）
data.referenceText: Who is responsible for dealing with and resolving the issue of homelessness?
data.referenceTranslate: 谁负责处理和解决无家可归的问题?
